mapper.select: SELECT iy.iy_the_business * (SELECT pc.spc_total AS spcTotal FROM wt_staff_pay_calculate AS pc WHERE pc.spc_code = #{spdCode}) AS spdTheBusinessTax FROM wt_insurance_year AS iy WHERE iy.iy_code = #{iyCode};

SELECT m.mr_id AS mrId ,m.mr_name AS mrName ,r.pm_r_title AS pmRTitle ,m.mr_account_num AS mrAccountNum ,CONCAT('SP_',( SELECT LPAD(COUNT(*)+1, 4, '0') FROM wt_staff_pay_calculate)) AS spcCode FROM wt_member_registration AS m INNER JOIN wt_payment_resource AS r on m.pm_r_code = r.pm_r_code WHERE m.mr_id = #{mrId};

SELECT (case when p_r_group_name = '시급' then substr(pr.p_r_ect,1,(INSTR(pr.p_r_ect,'or')-1)) when p_r_group_name = '인센티브' then pr.p_r_ect end) AS pREct ,pr.p_r_title AS pRTitle FROM wt_pay_resource AS pr;
SELECT iy.iy_code AS iyCode FROM wt_insurance_year AS iy;
SELECT m.mr_id AS mrId ,m.mr_name AS mrName FROM wt_member_registration AS m WHERE m.level_num = 2;

SELECT c.mr_id AS mrId ,c.spc_hourly_wage AS spcHourlyWage ,m.mr_name AS mrName ,c.spc_base_pay AS spcBasePay ,c.spc_incentive AS spcIncentive ,c.spc_total AS spcTotal ,d.spd_the_business_tax AS spdTheBusinessTax ,d.spd_total AS spdTotal ,p.sp_pay AS spPay ,c.spc_total_hour AS spcTotalHour ,d.iy_code AS iyCode ,pr.p_r_title AS pRTitle ,r.pm_r_title AS pmRTitle ,m.mr_account_num AS mrAccountNum FROM wt_staff_pay AS p INNER JOIN wt_staff_pay_calculate AS c ON p.mr_id=c.mr_id LEFT join wt_staff_pay_deduction AS d ON p.mr_id = d.mr_id LEFT JOIN wt_member_registration AS m ON p.mr_id = m.mr_id LEFT JOIN wt_payment_resource AS r ON m.pm_r_code = r.pm_r_code LEFT JOIN wt_pay_resource AS pr ON p.p_r_title = pr.p_r_title WHERE p.mr_id = #{mrId};
